com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack
Class CircularZoneTrigger

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.positiontrack.CircularZoneTrigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.Serialisable, ZoneTrigger
public class CircularZoneTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZoneTrigger

This ZoneTrigger represents a zone of circular shape. In order to provide for a hysteresis the circle has an outer and an inner radius.

Constructor Summary
CircularZoneTrigger(Coord center, int innerRadius, int outerRadius)
          Creates a new CircularZoneTrigger based on the given center and inner and outer radius.

 Coord getCenter()
          Gets the center of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger.

          Gets the inner radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.

          Gets the outer radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.

          Sets the center of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger.
 void setInnerRadius(int innerRadius)
          Sets the inner radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.

          Sets the outer radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.

Constructor Detail

CircularZoneTrigger

public CircularZoneTrigger(Coord center,
                           int innerRadius,
                           int outerRadius)
Creates a new CircularZoneTrigger based on the given center and inner and outer radius.

Parameters:
center - The center of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger.
innerRadius - The inner radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters. Note that a position is considered to be within the zone only when its distance to the center is smaller than this radius.
outerRadius - The outer radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters. Note that a position is considered to be out of the zone only when its distance to the center is bigger than this radius.
Method Detail

Gets the center of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger.

Returns:
The center of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger.

getInnerRadius

public int getInnerRadius()
Gets the inner radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters. Note that a position is considered to be within the zone only when its distance to the center is smaller than this radius.

Returns:
The inner radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.

getOuterRadius

public int getOuterRadius()
Gets the outer radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters. Note that a position is considered to be ouut of the zone only when its distance to the center is bigger than this radius.

Returns:
The outer radius of the circular zone represented by this CircularZoneTrigger in meters.
